qFieldDefs: =ValueList('Data Last Reloaded','Incremental QVD Max Range','QVD Current Volume (in Days)','Current Version','Latest Version')

qDef.qDef:
=

	If(ValueList('Data Last Reloaded','Incremental QVD Max Range','QVD Current Volume (in Days)','Current Version','Latest Version')='Data Last Reloaded',
    
    	TimeStamp(ReloadTime() + $(vReportTimeDiffFromGMT)),
        
	If(ValueList('Data Last Reloaded','Incremental QVD Max Range','QVD Current Volume (in Days)','Current Version','Latest Version')='Incremental QVD Max Range',
    
    	TimeStamp('$(vMaxReportAge)') & ' (' & $(vu_report_rolling_range) & ' days)',

	If(ValueList('Data Last Reloaded','Incremental QVD Max Range','QVD Current Volume (in Days)','Current Version','Latest Version')='QVD Current Volume (in Days)',
    
    	Floor(Max({1}ReportEndTime)) - Floor(Min({1}ReportEndTime)),
                
	If(ValueList('Data Last Reloaded','Incremental QVD Max Range','QVD Current Volume (in Days)','Current Version','Latest Version')='Current Version',
    
    	'v$(app_version)',

	If(ValueList('Data Last Reloaded','Incremental QVD Max Range','QVD Current Volume (in Days)','Current Version','Latest Version')='Latest Version',
    
    	'$(vLatestVersion)'
        
)))))

extensionMeta.name: Layout container
extensionMeta.description: The layout container object has a canvas that can hold multiple objects. In this container you can freely move objects around, as well as position the objects on top of each other or overlapping.
extensionMeta.author: QlikTech International AB

bundle.name: Qlik Dashboard bundle
bundle.description:
This is a set of supported objects that will facilitate dashboard creation in Qlik Sense. These can be used in addition to the objects found under "Charts".

For limitations and support conditions, see the documentation.
